job.title: Data Scientist, Experimentation
job.description: Evolve is a hospitality company with a mission to make renting a vacation home easy for everyone. Thanks to an unapologetic passion for hospitality, we now support over 15,000 properties in over 750 markets across North America. We enjoy earning each guest and owner's business - all while having some fun along the way.Why this role As a tech-enabled disruptor in the vacation rental industry, our ability to confidently and quickly learn from experiments across business functions is rapidly becoming an indispensable lever to future growth. In this role, you’d be a key voice in defining the future of experimentation at Evolve, tackling the most challenging problems around scalability and statistical robustness, and expanding current methodology to learn in new areas of the business.Come join our fast-paced growth-stage culture working alongside other talented data professionals in an environment that invites and necessitates professional growth and learning.What you'll doDevelop experimentation capabilities to meet growing demand across domainsHelp design and prioritize experiments that maximize impact potentialChallenge the status quo to establish best-in-class practices that augment how we learn from experimentsDeepen working relationships with business and engineering teams to lower the barrier to test ideas and build trust in resultsEffectively communicate complex and ambiguous information to technical and non-technical stakeholdersInnovate on existing strategies by researching and applying techniques from other leading data science teams outside of EvolveWhat makes you a great fitBachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Statistics, or related quantitative field, Masters or PhD preferred2+ years of data science related workProgramming experience with Python and SQL, ideally in a full-stack machine learning settingSoftware development understanding to be able to create high-quality, reproducible codeStrong knowledge of experimental methodologies for working with a long tail of heterogeneous inventory that varies with respect to seasonality, market demand, and additional attributesProven track record of using data science techniques to make a clear business impact and iteratively improving over timeExperience working in a collaborative environment and communicating effectively with a variety of stakeholdersAn entrepreneurial mentality that can help define product strategy and produces great work with minimal supervisionLocation Evolve has a flexible working environment so teammates can work remotely from their home office in the state of Texas. We're Denver based and currently all working remotely.CompensationFor this role our salary range is $95,000 to $115,000 depending on relevant experience.Total Rewards at EvolveAt Evolve, we care for our teammates by supporting their physical, mental, and financial wellbeing through a comprehensive Total Rewards Program.Industry competitive pay, including equity in the company for all EvolversHealth insurance package options that include 100% employer paid HDHP plan and two PPO plan options for you and your dependentsEmployer-paid dental, and vision, for you and your qualified dependentsPaid life insurance, short-term disability, and long-term disability coverage401(k) with a 4% match that vests immediatelyPTO, sick days, and paid Parental LeaveRich learning and development program for EvolversBut wait, there’s more… optional benefits offered include commuter benefits, pet insurance and travel perks.About UsOpportunity: Our leadership and management teams are dedicated to creating meaningful learning and growth opportunities for all Evolvers, as well as providing clear expectations and continuous feedback.Community: It’s easy to make friends at Evolve. We support maintaining a strong community through our teammate-led groups focused on learning, inclusion, environmental wellness, and more.Transparency: Every month, our leadership team shares how the company is performing, explaining where we’re headed next, and recognizing team members for jobs well done.Values: They mean more to Evolve than just bullets on a page, they drive our daily decisions and impact how we work as a hospitality company.Earn ItBuild Loyalty One Interaction at a TimeCommunicate Often, Honestly & DirectlyEmbrace ChangeStay Hungry & HumbleCareBe EfficientTake RisksLearn Every DayHave Some Fun Along the WayWhich value sounds the most like you?Evolve is an equal opportunity employer.
